channel.title: Black Mesa techincal fix/install guide
channel.description:
Hi, I've written up a basic install guide for people to gather all of their knowledge about getting the mod to work without issues. The page is up here, and anyone can edit (no account required):
[url]https://pcgamingwiki.com/wiki/Black_Mesa[/url]
If you'd like me to add anything to it, please let me know in this thread and I can do it.
